alert.note: Alert for Sullivan (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 05 at 3:22AM CDT until August 05 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of north central Missouri and northeast Missouri, including the following counties, in north central Missouri, Linn MO, Macon, Putnam and Sullivan. In northeast Missouri, Adair and Schuyler. * WHEN...Until 930 AM CDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. Numerous roads remain closed due to flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 322 AM CDT, the transportation department reported numerous road closures due to water over roadways. Flooding is already occurring. Between 2 and 4.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Kirksville, Milan, La Plata, Green City, Queen City, Novinger, Greentop, Greencastle, Brashear, Browning, Purdin, Humphreys, Gibbs, Millard, Worthington, Elmer, South Gifford, Green Castle, Winigan and New Boston. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
